page.title: 08Housing in the Wolfords
page.content: In the Todenham area of the block and Great Wolford the majority of the houses are owner occupied, with a small number being second homes only used at weekends. Little Wolford and Todenham have a handful of tied cottages nearly all for agricultural workers. There are three cottages in Great Wolford let for Holiday visitors and one in Little Wolford. The three villages have a number of council owned houses and bungalows, 10 in Todenham, 13 in Great Wolford and 8 in Little Wolford. Little Wolford is unusual in having a large proportion of its houses privately rented: in fact only about 14 are owner occupied while 8 belong to the council and 22 are either tenanted or tied cottages and houses, the majority of these belonging to one estate.
